Description


	We are currently hiring a Senior Email Marketing Associate who will be responsible for developing and executing email campaigns that drive customer engagement, enhance retention, and contribute to revenue growth.
	This role covers the full campaign lifecycle, including planning, content creation, implementation, and performance tracking. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging and use data insights to continuously improve results.


Responsibilites


	Develop, execute, and optimize end-to-end email marketing strategies.&nbsp;
	Grow and segment our email database for targeted campaigns.
	Design and implement direct email marketing campaigns aligned with company goals.
	Write and proofread engaging newsletters with clear, grammatically accurate content.&nbsp;
	Ensure mobile-friendly email templates and optimize layouts.&nbsp;
	Enhance templates with graphics, personalization, and advanced features.&nbsp;
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging.&nbsp;
	Analyze campaign performance, providing actionable insights for improvement.&nbsp;
	Report on revenue generated from email marketing efforts.


Requirements


	Minimum of Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
	Minimum of 3 years&rsquo; experience in email or digital marketing.
	Proficiency in email marketing platforms such as HubSpot and Mailchimp.
	Strong copywriting and project management skills.
	Hands-on experience with HTML, CMS, and marketing automation tools.
	Working knowledge of SEO/SEM and Google Analytics.

	Remote-First Environment:&nbsp;Work from anywhere while staying connected to a vibrant, collaborative team.
	Competitive Salary and Benefits:&nbsp;We offer a salary that&rsquo;s benchmarked against the best in the industry, ensuring your expertise and impact are fully rewarded.

Senior Email Marketing Associate (Nigeria) Job at Reliance Health




        
    

        
        Reliance Health uses Technology to Make Healthcare Accessible and Affordable. Through an integrated approach that includes affordable health insurance, telemedicine, and a combination of partner and proprietary healthcare facilities, Reliance Health offers innovative healthcare solutions that meet the needs of emerging markets.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Email Marketing Associate (Nigeria)

Job Location: Remote
Job type: Full-time
Category: Brand and Growth

Description
     

            
    




	We are currently hiring a Senior Email Marketing Associate who will be responsible for developing and executing email campaigns that drive customer engagement, enhance retention, and contribute to revenue growth.
	This role covers the full campaign lifecycle, including planning, content creation, implementation, and performance tracking. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging and use data insights to continuously improve results.


Responsibilites


	Develop, execute, and optimize end-to-end email marketing strategies. 
	Grow and segment our email database for targeted campaigns.
	Design and implement direct email marketing campaigns aligned with company goals.
	Write and proofread engaging newsletters with clear, grammatically accurate content. 
	Ensure mobile-friendly email templates and optimize layouts. 
	Enhance templates with graphics, personalization, and advanced features. 
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging. 
	Analyze campaign performance, providing actionable insights for improvement. 
	Report on revenue generated from email marketing efforts.


Requirements


	Minimum of Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
	Minimum of 3 years’ experience in email or digital marketing.
	Proficiency in email marketing platforms such as HubSpot and Mailchimp.
	Strong copywriting and project management skills.
	Hands-on experience with HTML, CMS, and marketing automation tools.
	Working knowledge of SEO/SEM and Google Analytics.


Benefits
At Reliance Health, we prioritize our people and their well-being. Our benefits package is designed to support your success, growth, and happiness. Here’s what you’ll enjoy:


	Remote-First Environment: Work from anywhere while staying connected to a vibrant, collaborative team.
	Competitive Salary and Benefits: We offer a salary that’s benchmarked against the best in the industry, ensuring your expertise and impact are fully rewarded.
	Premium Health Insurance: Comprehensive health coverage for you and your family, because your well-being comes first.
	Unlimited Leave: Take the time you need when you need it—no limits, no questions.
	Meaningful Impact: Play a key role in transforming customer experiences and shaping healthcare innovation.
	Collaborative Work Culture: Join a supportive, inclusive, and team-focused environment that celebrates diversity.
	Growth Opportunities: Access tools, mentorship, and resources to elevate your skills and career.
	Learning & Development Allowance: We provide an allowance to support your ongoing professional growth and skill enhancement.

Job Type: Permanent/Full time

Job Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Meet and exceed sales targets
	Successfully create a business from new and existing customer accounts
	Manage complex negotiations with senior-level executives
	Build rapport and establish long-term relationships with customers
	Conduct market research to identify selling possibilities and evaluate customer needs
	Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking, and social media.


Requirements


	BSc in Marketing, Business Admin, or any relevant field

	Strong written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency in English
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Representative",
  "description": "TeamAce Limited - Our client is&nbsp;a leading craftsmanship and leather care organisation renowned for delivering premium leather restoration, maintenance, and bespoke services.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Posiition: Customer&nbsp;Service Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Customer Service Representative, you will be the first point of contact for clients, providing exceptional service, handling inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring a smooth customer experience in line with the brand&rsquo;s high-quality craftsmanship standards.


Responsibilities


	Greet and assist customers in person, via phone, email, and social media platforms.
	Handle inquiries regarding leather care services, pricing, and turnaround times.
	Process customer orders, payments, and service requests accurately.
	Track and follow up on customer orders to ensure timely delivery and satisfaction.
	Maintain a professional and positive brand image in all interactions.
	Resolve customer complaints efficiently, escalating complex issues when necessary.


Requirements
